headline: This free online course will teach you to edit videos professionally with Shotcut and Adobe Premiere Pro.

As a content creator, your choice of video editing software can define your career and it is essential to select the appropriate video editing software for your creative purposes. So what do you have to lose? Benefit yourself by mastering video-editing using Shotcut and Adobe Premiere Pro.

courseDescription:
Video content helps users better understand a subject, product or service, increasing traffic and sales. However, video production and editing may be costly and time-consuming. In light of the growing demand for video, video-editing software makes putting videos together faster and more economical. This course introduces us to the Shotcut and Adobe Premiere Pro and allows us to learn how to edit videos expertly. It starts by highlighting the benefits of using editing software.

Then it introduces Shotcut, the best free editing software. You will explore how to use Shotcut starting with the basics, such as adding, ordering files and syncing audio with a video file. We will use examples to showcase how to cut and edit video files. Next, we will discuss more advanced features, including adding transitions, ‘B Roll’ and audio effects. Additionally, you will learn to use playlists for efficient workflow and explore recommended render and export settings.

Adobe Premiere Pro enables you to produce a video of the best possible quality. From basics to the more advanced options, you will investigate how to use Adobe Premiere Pro. You will discover how to add, arrange, cut and edit video files. After that, you will learn to add text, transitions, images, video effects and format videos for Instagram. We will explore how to add keyframes and jump cuts, as well as colour grading and brightening videos. Enrol in this course and learn how to make better videos with higher production quality.
